feed.title: SAP Community - ABAP Development
feed.subtitle: ABAP Development Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: To have Dropdown and Input field in ALV TREE OR in Hierarchical ALV output
entry.content:
Hi Friends,

My requirement is to display multiple nodes or an hierarchical grid display by extending the 1st node or the line to have the corresponding item data. 

It can be achieved by using cl_gui_alv_tree. But my requirement is to allow user to edit and select new values from the dropdown. As I understood, it can be achieved only in cl_gui_alv_grid whereas it won't have the hierarchical or multiple node extension view.

Below thread shows the alv field with input and dropdown and a resolve answer but not having more details for my understanding.

https://community.sap.com/t5/application-development-and-automation-discussions/dropdown-and-input-field-in-alv-tree/m-p/10528246

The image appears in the above link looks same for my requirement as well. 

Please provide a solution on achieving an ALV tree or hierarchical view report with an editable and dropdown fields in it.

Thanks for letting me know and appreciate your help.

Regards.

entry.title: Best approach to trigger automatic email notifications for COFC error messages in SAP
entry.content:
Hi experts,

We are currently facing recurring COFC error messages in SAP, such as:

"A master record for 11030211/MACH01 exists only in 2021"

This occurs because the system fails to find valid pricing data for old work centers (e.g., SG20). If these COFC errors are not resolved within the current period, they can affect the accuracy of actual activity costs, delay settlements, and cause production variances.

To prevent recurrence, we are considering setting up automated email notifications when such COFC errors are detected. The requirements are:

  1. Automatically send an email to a designated PIC when a COFC error is triggered.

  2. Email title format:
    "COFC error for company code SG10 Plant SG17 as at <posting date>"

Question:
What is the best approach to implement this auto-email setup in SAP?

  • Is it advisable to use a user-exit, implicit enhancement, or custom background job for detecting COFC errors?

  • Which table(s) or log(s) should be monitored to reliably capture COFC-related messages in real-time or batch?

  • Any recommendations for sending formatted email alerts via ABAP?

Appreciate any advice or examples you can share.

Thank you!

entry.title: Notification number send to particular user as popup message.
entry.content:
Hello Team,

When I save notification, that notification number will send to particular user as popup message. how to achieve this requirement.

Kindly provide any user-exit or FM.

Advance Thanks.

entry.title: Transport Eclipse to another computer
entry.content: Hello community, I have a new computer and I reinstalled Eclipse on it, but I saw that the favorite packages, the project, etc. do not appear even though I logged in with my user. My question is: Is it possible to copy a folder from the previous computer that makes the project, favorites, etc. appear on this one? Thank you in advance.

entry.title: How can extend an exsting Business Partner in the Role TR0151 with Payment details for company codes
entry.content:
We need to load a number of records for Treasury Management in the Business Partner. 

The Business Partners are already created and have the Role TR0151 (Counterparty) assigned. now I need to add in this Role a large number of Payment Details for a large number of company codes. I am thinking of using the Function Module FTB_BUPA_DARK_MAINTAIN_INTERN, but this always gives me either the Error "BP already Exists (When giving the Parameter "Create") or "nochanges Were Made Whe giving the Parameter "02 (Change)

Does anybody have a hint how to solve this, or use a different approach.

entry.title: On pressing create button of item table of object page in RAP it's being navigated to new blank page
entry.content:
Hello Team,

I am new to RAP and trying to create a basic fiori app using RAP with draft action.

I have created sales order header and item table, interface view, projection view and metadata extension to display data on list report and object page.

Now when i perform create action i am succefully able to create header data while pressing create button item table navigation is being done to new page with blank screen and apply button in the footer and when i click on apply it automatically navigates to main object page with one line item available in item table.

Now i have below mentioned questions

1) How i can see the fields in blank sub object page which is displayed on create of item table.

2) Why blank screen is shown.

3) How can i achieve - Table row will be added in item table on press on create button.

I have attached the Txt file which contains Metadata and behaviour definition code and Sales header and item cds consumption view along with screenshots.

entry.title: How to create a checkbox in SAPSCRIPT and see it via print preview
entry.content:
Hi SAPSCRIPT experts,

Is there a way to create a checkbox in SAPSCRIPT? My requirement is to create a checkbox, and it will be right beside other columns that are dynamic in record number. Meaning I am passing an internal table from my driver program to my SAPSCRIPT and at the right most column is a checkbox. Have you guys done it before? If yes, how?

Thanks, and hope to hear from you soon.

Newguy

entry.title: Can you pass the values from BAPI to Smart Table of a Fiori app?
entry.content: Assuming that my Fiori app is connected to an odata servici. Is it possible to display the returned results of the bapi into the fiori app?

entry.title: How to Hide a Combined Field Group (#AS_FIELDGROUP) by Default in a Fiori Elements List Report
entry.content:
I’m working on a CDS view where we use the #AS_FIELDGROUP annotation to display a combined field called “Planned Start / End”.

 @ui: {
  lineItem: [
  {  hidden: true
  },
      { 
      type: #AS_FIELDGROUP,
        valueQualifier: 'StartEnd',
        label: 'Planned Start / End',
        importance: #LOW
         }
  ],
      fieldGroup: [
      {
      exclude: true,
      qualifier: 'StartEnd',
        position: 10 }]
  }
  @Consumption:{
      filter.hidden: true
       }
       
  MfgOrderPlannedStartEndDate;
    @ui: {
    lineItem: [
    { hidden: true }
    ],
    fieldGroup: [
    {
    qualifier: 'StartEnd',
      position: 20 }] }
  @Consumption:{
    filter.hidden: true
     }
  MfgOrderPlannedEndStartDate;

At the moment, this field is shown by default in the list report, but I’d like it not to appear by default, while still allowing users to add it manually via Adapt UI (table personalization). I tried using exclude: true, but it didn’t work as expected.

Do you know if there’s a way to achieve this behavior? Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Analytical Query: Annotations for Filter by Measure
entry.content:
Hello All, 

I have built a Analytical Query using CDS. I have a requirement to automatically filter out data, which doesn't match specific conditions in few of the Columns(measures).

For eg. assume the condition is to exclude rows wherever Delta is 0

Col1Col2Col3Val1Val2Delta
ABE12-1
ABD220
ACD211
GCE422
GCF330

Depending which Characteristic columns user chooses columns to display, Delta column may result in various values.

Col1Val1Val2Delta
A550
G752
Col3Val1Val2Delta
D431
E541
F330
Col2Col3Val1Val2Delta
BD220
BE12-1
CD211
CE422
CF330

I can achieve this requirement by using "Filter by Measures" at runtime. Is there a way to achieve this via ABAP CDS annotations?

Thank You

Cc: copying some blog authors here for their advice @AndreaUS @joerg_franke @MarkGreen

entry.title: Program not working in Fiori but working in GUI
entry.content:
I have a custom report in SAP which is fetching data based on the selection screen input from vbak table and displaying as ALV. It is working as expected in SAP gui. But when executed on the fiori app with the same inputs, it is not giving any output.  The program contains simple select queries and loops to process data for Sales OTC flow.

Please help!!!

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Error in ABAP Cloud - "The Use of table /SCWM/T340D is not permitted"
entry.content:
I am building a code "ready for cloud" in on premise system and code below is triggering error message "The Use of table /SCWM/T340D is not permitted" -->

METHODS unpack_outer_hu

IMPORTING

is_t340D TYPE /scwm/t340d

is_ltap TYPE /scwm/ltap

EXPORTING

ev_del_level TYPE i.

 Normally it happens when object or table is not released to ABAP Cloud, we are having this error message for several EWM objects, is there any way to release it to ABAP Cloud?

I also tried to find some CDS view to use it, but didn´t find any CDS view related with table /scwm/t340d.

ABAP Cloud EWM - Basis

entry.title: How to add fields to LSMW Standard Batch Input
entry.content:
Hi All,

I am using a already created LSMW - Standard Batch Input with Object 0480 (FnctnlLoc TaskList), and need to add two custom fields.

The fields are added in source structure at 'Maintain Source Fields' level, but can not be mapped because they don't exist in the IBIPTLOP structure (that is in relation to my source structure) at 'Maintain Field Mapping and Conversion Rules' level.

The two new fields are already displayed in IA11 in the table view for 'General Operation Overview', but after running the LSMW they are empty.

How can these additional fields be filled via LSMW with Standard Batch Input method?

Thanks in advance.

entry.title: Effective way of doing an UPDATE with INNER JOIN in ABAP?
entry.content:
I have this statement in MS Access DB and I need to port it to ABAP:

 

UPDATE tableA
INNER JOIN tableB ON tableA.field1 = tableB.field1
SET tableA.field2 = tableB.field2
WHERE tableA.field2 IS NULL.
 
I can't figure out a "nice" way of doing this in ABAP without making it way more complicated than it should be.

What's your optimized way of doing this?
 
So far, this is what I have:

    DATA: lt_table1 TYPE TABLE OF table1.

    SELECT *
      INTO TABLE @DATA(lt_data)
      FROM table1
      INNER JOIN table2 ON
          table1~field1 = table2~field1
      WHERE table1~field2 IS NOT NULL.

    LOOP AT lt_data ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<fs_data>).
      <fs_data>-table1-short_id = <fs_data>-table2-short_id.
      INSERT <fs_data>-table1 INTO TABLE lt_table1.
    ENDLOOP.

    MODIFY table1 FROM TABLE lt_table1.


NOTE: My version of ABAP is 7.5

entry.title: TEMSE management - Getting error in Background Job
entry.content:
Hi, 

I am getting error in production server where I have set the scheduled job to emails payment advise to vendor every day. When this job execute manually on immediate then it working fine but schedule job of same custom program is getting below error

Although it is spool request reading error, it mean system is unable to write in spool. I have set parameter

rspo/store_location = G 

and system have 755 permission and enough space to write the file in the /usr/sap/SID/SYS/global/500SPOOL, but every day I need to run this job manually.

Production server configuration is ECC 6 EHP8 version , SUSE OS and Oracle database.

Please provide reason and solution.

 

Regards,

Tayab Shah

Any ideas?

entry.title: automation on convert batch input to bapi
entry.content:
Hello ,

upgrade to s\hana from ecc involve (not mandotery) , overwrite batch-inputs with bapi.

I have an idea and like to check with you , experts , if its a good one ...

The main idea is to convert the bdcdata internal table to the tables used as an input to the bapi .

i'll build a generic function\method with input params: transaction,bdcdata[] .

Using there  z table with mapping of screen\fields from bdcdata to table\field on the bapi input data .

we'll insert the generic function\method instead of command  "call transacrion fb01... using bdcdata" that will convert the bdcdata  to bapi tables and run the bapi instead .

that's the idea. do you find in usefull ? is there other automation instead of rewrite the code in all the  programs involve batch-input?

thanks,

Koby

We have created a custom field, assigned it to the custom layout and tried using the BADI- INV10_LIST_OF_STOCKS_FORM_I. However, we are unable to get the username.

Please advise.

Thanks,

Ruwani

entry.title: Syntactically incompatible change of existing functionality error.
entry.content:
Hi,

In my custom code i am using the below BAPI.
Everything works fine but i get the error message which you can see in the header of the question, in ATC.
I  went through the snotes but didn't help me. (2438131, 2215852 ) 
How can i get over this issue?
Here is the BAPI.

  METHOD /bobf/if_frw_action~execute.
    TYPES: BEGIN OF lty_delivery_all,
             key     TYPE /bobf/conf_key,
             ref_doc TYPE vgbel,
           END OF lty_delivery_all.

    DATA: lt_items_all    TYPE TABLE OF /scmtms/s_tor_item_tr_k,
          lv_action_key   TYPE /bobf/conf_key,
          lt_mod          TYPE /bobf/t_frw_modification,
          ls_mod          TYPE /bobf/s_frw_modification,
          lr_action_par   TYPE REF TO /bobf/s_atf_a_create_file,
          lr_atf_root     TYPE REF TO /bobf/s_atf_root_k,
          ls_parameters   TYPE /bobf/s_atf_a_create_file,
          lt_return       TYPE TABLE OF bapiret1,
          lt_success      TYPE TABLE OF bapivbrksuccess,
          lt_delivery_all TYPE TABLE OF lty_delivery_all,
          lv_pdf          TYPE fpcontent,
          lv_destination  TYPE rfc_dest. 

    CONSTANTS: lc_x           TYPE c                       VALUE 'X',
               lc_c           TYPE c                       VALUE 'C',
               lc_ordbilltyp  TYPE fkara                   VALUE 'Z01',
               lc_ref_doc_ca  TYPE c LENGTH 1              VALUE 'K',
               lc_kschl       TYPE na_kschl                VALUE 'ZMRT',
               lc_name_prefix TYPE c LENGTH 17             VALUE 'Test',
               lc_mime_code   TYPE w3conttype              VALUE 'application/pdf',
               lc_att_type    TYPE /bobf/attachment_type   VALUE 'ATCMT',
               lc_att_schema  TYPE /bobf/attachment_schema VALUE 'DEFAULT'.

    "Get items to be able to reach delivery numbers.
    io_read->retrieve_by_association(
      EXPORTING
        iv_node        = /scmtms/if_tor_c=>sc_node-root
        it_key         = it_key
        iv_association = /scmtms/if_tor_c=>sc_association-root-item_tr
        iv_fill_data   = abap_true
      IMPORTING
        et_data        = lt_items_all ).

    "Prepare delivery table for all FOs.
    LOOP AT lt_items_all ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<ls_item>) WHERE base_btd_id IS NOT INITIAL AND base_btd_tco = '73'.
      APPEND INITIAL LINE TO lt_delivery_all ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<ls_delivery_all>).

      <ls_delivery_all>-key = <ls_item>-parent_key.
      SHIFT <ls_item>-base_btd_id LEFT DELETING LEADING '0'.
      <ls_delivery_all>-ref_doc = |{ <ls_item>-base_btd_id  ALPHA = IN }|.
    ENDLOOP.

    "Prepare data to be able to check if invoice generation should be blocked or not.
    IF lt_delivery_all IS NOT INITIAL.
      SELECT tknum,tpnum,vbeln
        FROM vttp INTO TABLE @DATA(lt_vttp)
        FOR ALL ENTRIES IN @LT_delivery_all
        WHERE vbeln = @LT_delivery_all-ref_doc.

      IF sy-subrc = 0 AND  lt_vttp IS NOT INITIAL.
        SELECT vbeln,faksk,lifsk,spstg
          FROM likp INTO TABLE @DATA(lt_likp)
          FOR ALL ENTRIES IN @LT_vttp
          WHERE vbeln = @LT_vttp-vbeln.

        IF sy-subrc = 0 AND lt_likp IS NOT INITIAL.
          SELECT vbeln,posnr,faksp,vgbel,vgpos,vgtyp
            FROM lips INTO TABLE @DATA(lt_lips)
            FOR ALL ENTRIES IN @LT_likp
            WHERE vbeln = @LT_likp-vbeln.

          IF sy-subrc = 0.
            SORT lt_lips BY vbeln posnr.
          ENDIF.
        ENDIF.
      ENDIF.
    ENDIF.

    "Generate attachments one by one for the selected FOs.
    LOOP AT it_key ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<ls_key>).

      "Prepare delivery table for the current FO.
      DATA(lt_delivery) = VALUE bapivbrk_t( FOR ls_del IN lt_delivery_all WHERE ( key = <ls_key>-key ) ( ordbilltyp = lc_ordbilltyp
                                                                                                         ref_doc_ca = lc_ref_doc_ca
           	                                                                                             ref_doc    = ls_del-ref_doc  ) ).
      "Stop GAI creation in case preceding docs have blocks.
      IF lt_delivery IS NOT INITIAL.
        LOOP AT lt_delivery ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<ls_delivery>).
          IF VALUE #( lt_likp[ vbeln = <ls_delivery>-ref_doc faksk = lc_x ]      OPTIONAL ) IS NOT INITIAL.
            DELETE lt_delivery WHERE ref_doc = <ls_delivery>-ref_doc.
          ELSEIF VALUE #( lt_likp[ vbeln =  <ls_delivery>-ref_doc lifsk = lc_x ] OPTIONAL ) IS NOT INITIAL.
            DELETE lt_delivery WHERE ref_doc = <ls_delivery>-ref_doc.
          ELSEIF VALUE #( lt_likp[ vbeln =  <ls_delivery>-ref_doc spstg = lc_x ] OPTIONAL ) IS NOT INITIAL.
            DELETE lt_delivery WHERE ref_doc = <ls_delivery>-ref_doc.
          ELSEIF VALUE #( lt_lips[ vbeln =  <ls_delivery>-ref_doc faksp = lc_x ] OPTIONAL ) IS NOT INITIAL.
            DELETE lt_delivery WHERE ref_doc = <ls_delivery>-ref_doc.
          ELSEIF VALUE #( lt_lips[ vgbel =  <ls_delivery>-ref_doc vgtyp = lc_c ] OPTIONAL ) IS NOT INITIAL.
            DELETE lt_delivery WHERE ref_doc = <ls_delivery>-ref_doc.
          ENDIF.
        ENDLOOP.
      ELSE.
        CONTINUE.
      ENDIF.

      "Create invoice.
      CALL FUNCTION 'BAPI_BILLINGDOC_CREATEMULTIPLE' DESTINATION lv_destination
        TABLES
          billingdatain = lt_delivery
          return        = lt_return
          success       = lt_success. "(Not optional!)

      CLEAR: lt_delivery.

      "Using the invoice number do the attachment.
      LOOP AT lt_return ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<ls_return>).

        IF <ls_return>-type NE if_cwd_constants=>c_message_success.
          MESSAGE ID <ls_return>-id TYPE <ls_return>-type NUMBER <ls_return>-number WITH <ls_return>-message_v1 <ls_return>-message_v2 INTO lv_dummy.
          /scmtms/cl_msg_helper=>msg_helper_add_symsg( CHANGING co_message = eo_message ).
          CONTINUE.
        ENDIF.

        "Wait up to 5 seconds until the billing document is ready.
        DO 5 TIMES.
          WAIT UP TO 1 SECONDS.

          cl_o2c_bil_services=>get_print_preview(
            EXPORTING
              iv_vbeln   = CONV #( <ls_return>-message_v1 )
              iv_kschl   = lc_kschl
            IMPORTING
              ev_pdf     =  lv_pdf
              es_message = DATA(ls_msg) ).

          IF lv_pdf IS NOT INITIAL.
            EXIT.
          ENDIF.
        ENDDO.

        IF lv_pdf IS INITIAL.
          MESSAGE ID ls_msg-msgid TYPE ls_msg-msgty NUMBER ls_msg-msgno WITH ls_msg-msgv1 ls_msg-msgv2 INTO lv_dummy.
          /scmtms/cl_msg_helper=>msg_helper_add_symsg( CHANGING co_message = eo_message ).
          CONTINUE.
        ENDIF.

        "Check if there is already an attachment.
        io_read->retrieve_by_association(
          EXPORTING
            iv_node        = /scmtms/if_tor_c=>sc_node-attachmentfolder
            it_key         = VALUE #( ( key = <ls_key>-key ) )
            iv_association = /scmtms/if_tor_c=>sc_association-root-attachmentfolder
          IMPORTING
            et_target_key  = DATA(lt_atf_key)  ).

        "If this is the first attachment, then first create an attachment node.
        IF lt_atf_key[] IS INITIAL.
          CREATE DATA lr_atf_root.
          lr_atf_root->key        = /bobf/cl_frw_factory=>get_new_key( ).
          lr_atf_root->parent_key = /scmtms/if_tor_c=>sc_node-root.
          ls_mod-change_mode      = /bobf/if_frw_c=>sc_modify_create.
          ls_mod-association      = /scmtms/if_tor_c=>sc_association-root-attachmentfolder.
          ls_mod-source_node      = /scmtms/if_tor_c=>sc_node-root.
          ls_mod-node             = /scmtms/if_tor_c=>sc_node-attachmentfolder.
          ls_mod-source_key       = <ls_key>-key.
          ls_mod-key              = lr_atf_root->key.
          ls_mod-data             = lr_atf_root.
          INSERT ls_mod INTO TABLE lt_mod.

          io_modify->do_modify( EXPORTING it_modification = lt_mod ).
          INSERT VALUE #( key = lr_atf_root->key ) INTO TABLE lt_atf_key.
        ENDIF.

        "Fill the parameter table
        CREATE DATA lr_action_par.
        GET REFERENCE OF ls_parameters INTO lr_action_par.
        ls_parameters-alternative_name          = lc_name_prefix && <ls_return>-message_v1.
        ls_parameters-content                   = lv_pdf.
        ls_parameters-file_name                 = lc_name_prefix && <ls_return>-message_v1.
        ls_parameters-mime_code                 = lc_mime_code.
        ls_parameters-name                      = lc_name_prefix && <ls_return>-message_v1.
        ls_parameters-description_language_code = sy-langu.
        ls_parameters-description               = lc_name_prefix && <ls_return>-message_v1.
        ls_parameters-description_content       = lc_name_prefix && <ls_return>-message_v1.
        ls_parameters-visibility_type           = abap_true.
        ls_parameters-attachment_type           = lc_att_type.
        ls_parameters-attachment_schema         = lc_att_schema.

        "Get action key for creating attachment.
        IF lv_action_key IS INITIAL.
          /scmtms/cl_common_helper=>get_do_keys_4_action(
            EXPORTING
              iv_host_bo_key      = /scmtms/if_tor_c=>sc_bo_key
              iv_host_do_node_key = /scmtms/if_tor_c=>sc_node-attachmentfolder
              iv_do_action_key    = /bobf/if_attachment_folder_c=>sc_action-root-create_file
            IMPORTING
              ev_action_key       = lv_action_key ).
        ENDIF.

        "Attach geberated PDF.
        io_modify->do_action(
          EXPORTING
            iv_act_key    = lv_action_key
            it_key        = lt_atf_key
            is_parameters = lr_action_par
          IMPORTING
            et_failed_key = DATA(lt_failed_key_atf) ).

        "Get tor id.
        DATA(lv_tor_id) = /scmtms/cl_tor_helper_root=>return_id_fortor_key( EXPORTING iv_tor_key = <ls_key>-key ).

        "Clear for the next round.
        CLEAR: ls_parameters, lt_atf_key, lr_action_par.
      ENDLOOP.
    ENDLOOP.
  ENDMETHOD.

 Here is the ATC message.

Regards
